Ella actualmente tiene Biohuertos Ecológicos se dedica a la plantaciones y producción de flores como rosales, margaritas, lirio, anís, romero, etc. El préstamo solicito para la compra de plantas injertas y silvestres o diversas plantas una vez reproducidas las plantas las  vende en el mercado de su localidad. Dando la  oportunidad para mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
Desea en el futuro comprar su casa. En la fotografía está ubicado la tercera persona lado derecha que viste con pantalón color negro, polo color rosada, chompa color negro, se encuentra ha lado del joven José Manuel.
texts.en:
Hilda Ayde, 54, is married and has a minor daughter.  She’s a member of the “La Rica Vicky-Chupaca” communal bank.  She has ecological orchards where she grows flowers like roses, daisy, lilies, anise, rosemary, etc.  

She requested the loan to buy grafted, wild and various plants.  Once the plants reproduce she sells them in the local market thus improving opportunities for income.  She wants to buy a house in the future.


In the photo, she’s third from the right and is wearing black pants, pink shirt and a black jacket; she’s next to José Manuel.

loans.use: to buy plants.

loans.name: Mariatu

texts.en:
This is 39 year-old Mariatu. She is married and has 4 children ages 23, 20, 18, and 15 years. 

In 2002, Mariatu established a clothing business. She began her business in order to develop her home and it is her major source of livelihood. Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, she earns about 900,000 Sierra Leone leones every month from this business.

Mariatu would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. She has already received and successfully repaid 1 loan and now requires a new loan in order to buy wax cotton and other clothing materials. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 250,000.

In the future, Mariatu plans to send her daughter abroad, to own a house, and to have a larger business center. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy wax cotton and other clothing materials.

loans.name: Nadramia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” CUSI COYLLOR DE CHINCHERO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Chinchero, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Nadramia; ella tiene 25 años de edad, conviviente  y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias ejerciendo su carrera de  técnica en farmacia ella cuenta con su botica donde vende diferentes jarabes, pastillas, lociones, perfumes, pañales entre otros, la socia lleva un año en este negocio el cual le va bien, a la vez la socia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas y luego los vende  a sus clientes que le solicitan.

La socia en esta oportunidad desea el crédito para comprar más medicamentos para su botica como la compra de pastillas y jarabes.

La socia se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The associate is a member of the Communal Bank ”CUSI COYLLOR DE CHINCHERO”; the bank is located in the Chinchero district in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco. The associate is Mrs. Nadramia; she is 25 years old, lives with her partner and has a son. The associate alternates her daily activities between two jobs. She studied to be a pharmacy technician and has a pharmacy where she sells different syrups, pills, lotions, perfumes, and diapers, to name a few. She’s been doing this for 1 year and it’s been going well. At the same time, she raises small animals like guinea pigs and chickens and then sells them to clients who ask for them.
The associate, at this time, is asking for the loan to buy more medications for her pharmacy, like pills and syrups.
The associate promises to pay the installments of her loan.

loans.use: buy more medications for her pharmacy, like pills and syrups.

loans.name: Safarali

texts.ru: Сафарали проживает в районе Дангара. Ему 48 лет. Он женат. У него семеро детей. Сафарали имеет средне - техническое образование, он агроном. По специальности он работает уже два года. Кроме того он занимается животноводством. Кредит берет для закупа двух бычков.
texts.en: Safarali lives in the Dangara district.  He is 48 years old, married and has seven children.  Safarali has a secondary-technical education as an agronomist.  He has been working in his field for two years.  Besides this, he is involved in animal husbandry.  Safarali is requesting this loan to buy two bulls.

loans.use: to buy two bulls

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a single mother living in Hoima, Uganda. She owns a bar, which she started with her salary that she saved while working with the police. 

Grace is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy beers and soft drinks to sell.  She faces the challenges of price fluctuations and inflation. She wishes to educate her children and expand her business to new markets.

loans.use: to purchase beers and soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Ziyo

texts.ru: Зиё житель района Рудаки. Ему 50 лет. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Зиё занимается животноводством. Он в основном откармливает и продает скот. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Ziyo is a resident of the Rudaki district.  He is 50 years old, married and has six children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Ziyo is involved in animal husbandry.  He primarily fattens up and sells livestock.  Ziyo is requesting this loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Akobir

texts.ru: Акобир проживает в районе Дангара. Ему 33 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его дети маленькие. Акобир имеет среднее образование. Он рядом с домом открыл продуктовый магазин, где работает продавцом. В этой области он 7 лет. Кредит берет для приобретения холодильника и покупки молочных изделий.
texts.en: Akobir lives in the Dangara district.  He is 33 years old, married and has two children.  His children are small.  Akobir has a secondary education.  He opened a food market near his house, where he works as a salesperson.  He has been in this business for seven years.  Akobir is requesting this loan to buy a refrigerator and dairy products.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and dairy products

loans.name: Alexandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
Alexandra es una mujer de 35 años, se caracteriza por ser una persona alegre, de caracter fuerte y muy responsable en su trabajo.Alexandra vive con su mamá y sus tres hijos en la ciudad de Ibarra en la Provincia de Ibarra.

Alexandra trabaja con una socia en una cafetería, vendiendo quimbolitos, humitas y tamales que son comidas tradicionales del Ecuador hechas a base de maíz tierno pueden ser de dulce o de sal, acompañado de un café o té de alguna plantita. Es el tercer crédito que realiza en Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser utilizado en la compra de materia prima como maíz tierno, azúcar, sal, café y también unas mesas para recibir mejor a sus clientes. Esta inversión le permitirá incrementar sus ventas y clientes que le ayudarán a sustentar los gastos de su hogar y sus hijos debido a que es el único ingreso económico para su familia.

El sueño de Alexandra es poder construir el techo de la cafetería ya que solo atiende en las mesas con sombrillas.
texts.en:
Alexandra is a 35-year-old woman who is noted for being a cheerful person with a strong character and who is very responsible at work.  She lives with her mother and three children in the city of Ibarra in Ibarra Province.

Alexandra works as a partner in a coffee shop selling “quimbolitos” [sweet, steamed corn cakes], “humitas” [type of tamale] and tamales that are traditional Ecuadorean dishes made from tender corn; they can be sweet or savory and are usually served with coffee or herbal tea.

This is the third loan she’s taken with Fodemi and she will use it to buy raw materials like tender corn, sugar, salt and coffee and also some tables to better serve her customers.  This investment will allow her to increase sales and clientele which will help her cover household expenses and support her children since this is her only source of family income.  Alexandra’s dream is to be able to build a roof over her coffee shop since she currently is only taking care of customers at tables with umbrellas.

loans.use: to buy corn, sugar, coffee and some tables.

loans.name: Bendicion De Dios Group

texts.es: El Banco comunal Bendición de Dios está conformado por 10 emprendedores que son de las misma comunidad cada uno de ellos tiene sus propios negocios en  el cual se unieron para apoyarse y motivarse uno a otros. No es la primera vez que este grupo está solicitando crédito para invertir en sus negocios. Actualmente este grupo está solicitando financiamiento para invertir en el negocio y aumentar su inventario. Maria Mercedes que es parte de este grupo su negocio es la venta de recarga y variedad de refrescos, helados ella ha pasado muchos obstáculos en su vida pero sigue adelante,actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de recargas movistar y claro, bolsas, variedad de frutas, azucar, entre otros productos para la elaboracion de los refrescos.
texts.en:
The communal bank Bendición de Dios is made up of 10 entrepreneurs who are from the same community. Each one of them has his own business, and they are united to support one another and motivate each other. This isn’t the first time that this group has asked for a loan to invest in their businesses. Now this group is asking for funding to invest in the business. 

Maria Mercedes is part of this group, and her business is selling phone recharges and a variety of refreshments and ice cream. She has faced many obstacles in her life but she continues moving forward. She is asking for funding to buy phone recharges for Movistar and Claro, as well as bags, a variety of fruits, and sugar, among other products to be able to make her beverages.

loans.use: to buy phone recharges, as well as bags, fruit and sugar for making drinks.

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.es: Evaristo, de 41 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Convive con Miriam, quien es comerciante, fruto de esa unión tiene dos hijos de 16 y 11 años de edad. Juntos habitan en su propia casa que construyeron con mucho esfuerzo. Las actividades que realiza Evaristo es la de agricultura ya que cuenta con un terreno ubicado a la altura del Km. 60 de la Carretera Federico Basadre donde tiene sembrado un extensión de cacao que saca a vender periódicamente en la ciudad de Lima, pues logra conseguir que le  paguen buenos precios. Ya lleva dedicándose a esta actividad cerca de 8 años contando con el apoyo de peones para la cosecha y mantenimiento de su terreno, a los que paga por jornada de trabajo. Paralelo a esta actividad también se dedica a la albañilería, logrando tener más conocimientos, siendo últimamente requerido por sus clientes. Le gusta sus actividades pues logra desenvolverse muy bien en ambas pues ha logrado aprender muy bien sus funcionamiento, además del ingreso económico que le genera, teniendo planes de adiestrase más en el rubro de albañilería y poder subir de categoría logrando un mejor ingreso económico. Este será el préstamo número 08 con la institución MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de abonos y en el mantenimiento de sus cultivos de cacao, pagando peones, y con una parte en la compra de algunas herramientas de albañilería.
texts.en:
Evaristo, 41, is a hardworking, enterprising man who very much wants to get ahead.  He lives with Miriam who is a merchant; they have two children who are 16 and 11 years old.  They all live together in their own house that they built with much effort.  

Evaristo is a farmer; he has a field located at the height of kilometer 60 along the Federico Basadre Highway where he’s growing cocoa beans to sell periodically in the city of Lima because he gets good prices there.  Alongside this activity, he also works as a bricklayer learning more skills that are required by his customers lately.  He likes his activities because he’s able to develop well in both since he’s learned the tasks very well in addition to the good income they generate.  He plans to increase his bricklaying skills to continue rising in category thus earning better income.

This will be MFP loan #8 so he’s hoping for your collaboration so that he can continue toward his objectives.  He will use the requested 1000 new soles to buy manure for his cocoa bean crops and to pay day laborers; he will use part of it also to buy some bricklaying tools.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure, hire day laborers and buy work tools.

loans.name: Xenia

texts.es: Xenia, de 20 años, es una joven emprendedora, es soltera y no tiene hijos. A diario comparte su vida con su madre, sus abuelos y sus hermanos, viven juntos en una casa alquilada y juntos trabajan para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Desde muy joven Xenia siempre estuvo a lado de su madre en todo momento, observando y aprendiendo del negocio, que es la venta de comida, es así que cuando tuvo un pequeño capital decidió empezar un negocio por si misma. Desde entonces logró ser independiente y aportar en los gastos de su hogar. Ahora vende comida y bebidas en la vereda de su casa y a diario acude mucha gente por lo bien que prepara los alimentos y así como el buen trato que ofrece a sus consumidores. Lleva realizando este trabajo por más de 5 años, claro que al principio su madre la apoyaba, pero hace dos que lo hace ella sola. Ahora va ccamino a ser una pequeña empresaria. Le esta yendo muy bien ya que genera buenos ingresos y además le permite hacer algunos cursos para completar su educación. Por el momento desea solo mantener su negocio y después con el tiempo tener un restaurante en donde pueda atender mejor a sus clientes. Este será el segundo crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual y responsable. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará ingredientes para continuar con su trabajo, además de implementar su almacén con bebidas para poder ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en: Xenia is 20 years old and is an enterprising young woman who is single and does not have any children.  She spends every day with her mother, her grandparents, and her siblings, who all live together in a home that they rent and work together to provide a better quality of life for the family.  Ever since she was very young Xenia was always at her mother’s side observing and learning about her food-selling business.  As soon as Xenia had a little capital she decided to go into business herself.  This enabled her to be independent and to contribute to the household expenses.  Xenia now sells meals and beverages on the sidewalk in front of her house, and many people go there every day for the food she prepares and for the good service she offers her customers.  She has now had this business for more than 5 years—she of course received help from her mother at first, but for the past two years she has run her business on her own.  Xenia is now on her way to becoming a small businesswoman.  Things are going very well, since she earns a good income and it also allows her to take some classes so she can complete her education.  Right now she wants to maintain her business, though she eventually wants to have a restaurant where she could provide better service to her customers.  This will be Xenia’s second loan with MFP, and she hopes to continue working with the organization so she can continue working toward her goals.  She promises to make all of her payments in a punctual and responsible manner.  Xenia plans to use the 1000 soles she has asked for to purchase ingredients so she can continue with her work.  She also plans to start selling beverages so she can offer her customers greater variety.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for preparing meals, and to purchase a variety of beverages.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a 59-year-old married man with eight children living in Kasese, Uganda. His personal goal is to educate his children.

Charles has been dealing in the firewood business and his major hardships are seasonal weather and inadequate capital to purchase stock; however, he has a vision of expanding his business to new areas. Charles needs a loan to buy firewood for resale.

loans.use: to buy charcoal and firewood for resale.

loans.name: Fayzali

texts.ru: Файзали проживает в районе Хамадони. Ему 56 лет. Он женат. Имеет средне - специальное образование, он шафер. В этой области Файзали работает 30 лет. Кроме того он занимается растениеводством. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Fayzali lives in the Hamadoni district.  He is 56 years old, married.  He has a secondary-specialized education as a driver.  Fayzali has been working in this field for 30 years.  Besides this work, he is involved in agriculture.  He is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Ayak

texts.en:
Ayak is a 32-year-old married woman with three children, all of whom are in school. She has had a business selling charcoal in Bor, South Sudan for three years.

Ayak is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Zaravshon

texts.ru: Заравшон жительница района Хамадони. Ей 38 лет. Она разведена. У нее пятеро детей. Она имеет средне - специальное образование, бухгалтер. По специальности проработала 5 лет. На сегодняшний день Заравшон продает пирожки. Кредит берет для покупки необходимых продуктов.
texts.en: Zaravshon is a resident of the Hamadoni district.  She is 38 years old, divorced and has five children.  She has a secondary-specialized education as an accountant.  She spent five years working in that field.  Today, Zaravshon sells piroshki.  She is requesting this loan to purchase necessary products.

loans.use: to buy necessary products

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
La socia anteriormente se dedicaba a trabajar en una chicharoneria,pero ahora se esta dedicando a su propio negocio que es una chicharroneria donde vende chicharrones que es un plato que se hace a  base de carne de chancho y paps fritas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el local de su chicharroneria.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar crane de chancho y papas fritas al por mayor.
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower previously worked at a chicharroneria (fried pork restaurant), but now works at her own business, which is a chicharroneria where she sells chicharrones, which is a dish made from pork and fried potatoes. She works from 8:00am to 6:00pm, and by means of this business is raising her children.  

Her dream is to expand the premises of her chicharroneria. She is applying for the loan in order to buy pork and fried potatoes at wholesale. The borrower is happy about receiving the loan, and promises to make her installment payments.

loans.use: To buy pork and fried potatoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has five children, four of whom go to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members.
 
Juliet sells bananas at the market on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last three years. She works seven days a week. She has requested a loan of 500,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bunches of bananas. 

Her major business challenges are transportation and seasonality. Her aspirations and goals are to become a wholesaler and also to buy a plot of land.
 
Juliet lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity, but does not have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy more bunches of bananas.

loans.name: Eseza

texts.en:
Eseza lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has five children, all of whom go to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members. 

Eseza sells second-hand clothes at the market on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last ten years. She works six days a week. She has requested a loan of 500,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes. 

Her major business challenges are thieves and seasonality. Her aspirations and goals are to expand into a wholesale business.

Eseza lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity, but does not have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to buy more bales of used clothes.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is married and has five children who attend school. She lives in Kampala, Uganda.  She sells matooke (green plantains) at the market on a retail basis. She has been in business for nine years. She works six days a week. 

Betty is requesting for loan of 500,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bunches of matooke. Her major challenge is transportation and seasonality. Her goal is to expand into a wholesale business.

Betty lives in her own house with no access to piped water or electricity. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: to purchase more bunches of bananas.

loans.name: Frida

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando el ngeocio de venta de chicharrones que es un plato a base de carne de chancho y papas fritas,al socia por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el local de chicharroneria.La socia solicita el préstamo para la implementación de su negocio para comprar sillas y mesas.      
 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower is still working in her business selling chicharrones, which is a dish made from pork and fried potatoes. By means of this business, she is raising her children.

Her dream is to expand her chicharroneria.  She is applying for the loan in order to buy chairs and tables. The borrower is happy about receiving the loan, and promises to make her installment payments.

loans.use: To buy chairs and tables for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is 40 years old and married with four children. With three children in school, Mercy works very hard to provide for them.

Mercy runs a business buying and selling rice grains in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell.

Mercy has been in this business for six years.

In the future, Mercy would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has four children, all of whom go to school. She has no additional family members. 

Margaret sells charcoal at the market on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last five years. She works seven days a week. She has requested a loan of 500,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy bags of charcoal. 

Her major challenges are transportation and seasonality. Her aspirations and goals are to start going to villages for charcoal and also to build commercial houses. 

Margaret lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and medication.

loans.use: to buy more bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Muso

texts.ru: Мусо более двадцати лет занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и животноводством. Жена помогает по бизнесу. На воспитании у них один ребенок. Так как он живет в сельской местности как и все сельчане он работает на земле выращивает культуры. Он хочет увеличить поголовье скота и для этого ему нужны средства. Он хочет получить займ в размере 2000 сомони и надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Muso has been farming and raising cattle for twenty years. His wife helps him with the farm and the two are raising one child together. Muso lives in the countryside and, like everyone there, is making a living of the land. He wants to expand his herd and needs funds for it. That is why Muso wants to take out a loan of 2000 somoni and he hopes your will support him.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Sherali

texts.ru: Шерали проживает в районе Хамадони. Ему 50 лет. Он женат. У него 8 детей. Шерали предоставляет услугу. Он развозит пассажиров по маршруту Хамадони - Душанбе. В этой области имеет богатый опыт. Кредит берет для приобретения запчастей.
texts.en: Sherali lives in Hamadoni region. He is 50 years old, married and has eight children. Sherali is a shuttle taxi driver and transports passengers between Hamadoni and Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan (~200km/125 miles). He has many years of experience as a shuttle driver. Sherali is requesting this loan to purchase spare parts for his vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts

loans.name: Sangimo

texts.ru: Сангимо проживает в районе Хамадони. Ей 71 год. У нее четверо детей. Она имеет средне - специальное образование. По специальности она портниха. В этой области Сангимо работает 30 лет. Кредит берет для приобретения новой швейной машинки.
texts.en: Sangimo lives in the Hamadoni district.  She is 71 years old and has four children.  She has a secondary-specialized education.  She is a seamstress.  Sangimo has been working in this field for 30 years.  She is requesting this loan to purchase a new sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Mahmudkhan

texts.ru: Махмудхан проживает в районе Рудаки. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него 11 детей. Его сын находится на заработках заграницей. Сам Мухмудхан занимается животноводством. Он в основном откармливает и продает мелко - рогатый скот. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Mahmudkhan lives in the Rudaki region. He is 43 years old, married and has eleven children. His son works outside the country. Mahmudkhan himself raises cattle for a living. He usually raises and sells sheep and goats. However he is taking this loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Bakhtiyar

texts.ru: Bakhtiyar jenat i imeyet 2 detey. On jivet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi. Bakhtiyar uje 3 qoda kak rabotayet shoferom, ranshe 2 qoda on rabotal chasnim shoferom no uje 1 qod kak on rabotayet taxistom. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit zapchasti chtobi pochinit taxi dlya ludshego obsolujivaniya kliyentov i uludsheniya svoyego biznessa. Bakhtiyar nauchilsya etomu delu u svoyego otca kotoriy toje rabotal taxistom. Bakhtiyar 33 qoda.
texts.en: Bakhtiyar is married and has two children. He is 33 years old and lives in Baku region together with his family. For more then three years he has been working as a taxi driver. Baktiyar's father taught him to drive since he, too, was a taxi cab driver. At first Bakhiyar was driving as a freelancer, but two years ago he has become an official taxi driver. Bakhtiyar needs a loan of 2000 AZN in order to purchase spare parts for his taxi cab. A repaired car will allow him to offer a better and more reliable service for his customers and improve his business opportunities.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts

loans.name: Marigrace

texts.en:
This is Marigrace, 37, a resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. Her husband is Pepito, a security guard. She is a mother to her four children. She, together with her husband, manages the household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.                             

Marigrace operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries, and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, 5 pesos worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns income by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 Philippines Pesos (PHP) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 16,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add to her inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Marigrace hopes to be able to expand soon, just as she dreams to be able to give her family a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Gudelio

texts.en:
Gudelio farms on the oldest running farm on Staten Island, New York. He rents a small plot of land on the farm and organically grows everything from peppers and tomatoes, to onions and herbs. Though Gudelio has only been farming in the US for two years, in his home country of Mexico he farmed mangoes and papayas and sold them at the largest market in Mexico City- el mercado de abastos.

Gudelio is currently running his construction business during these winter months. He needs a loan to build his credit to eventually access larger amounts of capital, allowing him to grow his business and hire employees. Gudelio sells his vegetables at two markets in New York City but would eventually like to expand to more.

Gudelio learned about ACCION USA through a great partnership with NYC Grows New farmer development project. NYC Grows supports immigrants to develop family farms in and around New York city and works with ACCION to help farmers grow and formalize their businesses.

loans.use: to purchase seed and establish credit history.

loans.name: Youssef

texts.en:
Youssef is a 59-year-old single man. For the past 36 years, he has worked selling tobacco from a small table on the side of the street. Youssef lost his right hand during the Lebanese war, but this issue didn't stop him from making his own living. He works for his living in order not to ask others for help. 

Youssef is a hardworking man. He applied for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to expand his merchandise with more boxes of tobacco in order to increase his income. Youssef will also benefit from the loan to do the necessary maintenance to his home's sanitary facilities.

Youssef's good reputation encourages his customers to support him. He dreams of opening his own shop in the future.

loans.use: To increase his merchandise and buy more boxes of tobacco.
